comments.body:
In addition to the `lookup` method of taking in the policy, can you also try a policy argument like: 

```
policy:
  Id: SampleAuthorizationPolicy
  Version: "2012-10-17"
  Statement:
  - Sid: DenyAll
    Effect: Deny
    Resource: "{{ identity_info.identity_arn }}"
    Principal: "*"
    Action: "*"
```

The JSON argument type should automatically take that as well, but I'd like to have that validated in the module tests to enforce that UI.

That's cool, I didn't even realize that was possible.

New test added, but I've put it further up the file with the rest of the register variants.
